query:
SELECT 
                (flow_status->'step')::integer as step,
                jsonb_array_length(flow_status->'modules') as len,
                flow_status->'modules'->-1->>'branch_chosen' IS NOT NULL as is_branch_one,
                parent_job as ppp_job
            FROM v2_job 
                LEFT JOIN v2_job_status USING (id)
            WHERE v2_job.id = $1
